talks.title: Formalising Subject Reduction and Progress for Multiparty Session Processes
talks.abstract: As part of the Interactive Theorem Proving 2025 conference. Copresented, where I talked about the technical mechanization aspects and design choices.

talks.title: Introduction to the Rocq Programming Language
talks.abstract: An introduction to the Rocq programming language, as part of a lecture series on programming languages.

talks.title: Subject Reduction for Synchronous MPST in Coq
talks.venue: Department of Computer Science, University of Oxford
talks.abstract: This was the final Lecture of Master's Course in Distributed Processes, Types and Programming at the University of Oxford, presenting my work on mechanising subject reduction for synchronous MPST in Coq. This corresponds to the ITP'25 paper.
